body:
- [**closed**] Github api warning on create new project [#323](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/323)
- [**closed**] /bin/bash: ./.ci/build/php: Permission denied - both on Bitbucket and Github/CircleCI [#314](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/314)
- [**bug**] Document required authentication details [#257](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/257)
- [**enhancement**] Make the update-db + cache-clear functions a responsibility of build:env:create [#222](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/222)
- [**documentation**] Document lack of Windows support [#162](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/162)
- [**closed**] Bitbucket Support [#145](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/145)
- [**closed**] BT-27: Use GIT_SSH_COMMAND for pushing to Pantheon [[#188](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/188)](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/pull/188)
- [**closed**] BT-29: Support for custom build asset messages. [[#190](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/190)](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/pull/190)
- [**closed**] BT-39: Only build on pull requests [[#191](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/191)](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/pull/191)
- [**closed**] BT-24: Provide opportunity to correct mis-entered credentials [[#194](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/194)](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/pull/194)
- [**closed**] Running tests for 324 [[#338](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/338)](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/pull/338)

- [**closed**] Added support for changing the admin username [[#325](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/325)](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/pull/325)
- [**closed**] Regex needs to be multiline. [[#321](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/321)](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/pull/321)
- [**closed**] Respect gitignore file when building in Integrated Composer mode. [[#319](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/319)](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/pull/319)
- [**closed**] Adjust pattern so that all ssh key fixtures are cleaned up [[#309](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/309)](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/pull/309)
- [**closed**] Add scheduled CLU task creation to Bitbucket provider startTesting task [[#304](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/304)](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/pull/304)
- [**enhancement**] Remove unused use declarations [[#303](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/303)](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/pull/303)
- [**closed**] Add configuration example for self-hosted GitLab hostname. [[#286](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/286)](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/pull/286)
- [**enhancement**] Allow source_branch and sha for GitLab branch name in branchesForPullRequests output [[#299](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/299)](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/pull/299)
- [**closed**] Retrieve GitLab merge request states individually. [[#301](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/301)](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/pull/301)
- [**closed**] Add documentation for build:project:create options [[#293](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/293)](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/pull/293)

- [**closed**] Uncaught Error: Class 'Pantheon\TerminusBuildTools\ServiceProviders\RepositoryProviders\Bitbucket\PullRequestInfo' not found [[#212](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/212)](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/pull/212)

- [**closed**] Test D8 and GitLab [[#245](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/245)](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/pull/245)

name: 2.0.0 Beta 17
body:
- Allow git providers to provide build secrets. ([#268](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/268))
- Allow underscores in GitLab tokens ([#272](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/272))
- Add documentation around `checkPagedCallback()` ([#278](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/278))
- Introduce `--use-ssh` to perform initial repo push over SSH ([#279](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/279))
- Update 'build:env:create' to comment on a PR instead of a commit ([#280](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/280))
- Better docs for `build:comment:add:commit` and `build:comment:add:pr` ([#285](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/285))
- Add configuration example for self-hosted GitLab hostname. ([#286](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/286))
- Remove Bitbucket limitation in README ([#291](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/291))
- Support private Composer repos with `TERMINUS_BUILD_TOOLS_COMPOSER_AUTH` env variable ([#292](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/292))
- Add documentation for build:project:create options ([#293](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/293))
- Allow source_branch and sha for GitLab branch name in branchesForPullRequests output ([#299](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/299))
- Retrieve GitLab merge request states individually ([#301](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/301))
- Remove unused use declarations ([#303](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/303))
- Add scheduled CLU task creation to Bitbucket provider `startTesting` task ([#304](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/304))

name: 2.0.0 Beta 16
body:
- Update `BitbucketAPI` to handle API data pagination ([#267](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/267))
- Make `isPagedResponse()` and `getPagerInfo()` more flexible and typehint ([#264](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/264))
- Fix PHP notices when interacting with BitBucket API data ([#263](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/263))
	- BitBucket's API response is shaped differently than GitHub and GitLab. The values themselves are nested in a `values` key.
- Mark `branchesForPullRequests` method public ([#260](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/260))
- Properly parse the BitBucket visibility flag ([#256](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/256))
- Add missing use statement in BitbucketProvider ([#212](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/212))

name: 2.0.0 Beta 15
body: - Revert to `build:env:push` if `build:env:create` is run against dev ([#248](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/248))

name: 2.0.0 Beta 14
body:
New Features:

- Private repository support for `build:project:create` ([#226](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/226))
- Allow setting the Pantheon region during `build:project:create` ([#225](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/225))
- Build assets on project creation if command exists ([#207](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/207))


GitLab support:

- Add support for creating scheduled GitLab Pipeline ([#232](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/232))
- Add Drupal 8 GitLab test ([#245](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/245))
- Allow git providers to override build metadata ([#200](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/200))


Bug fixes:

- Gracefully fail if build:env:create source and multidev are the same ([#227](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/227))

Misc:

- Documentation updates ([#243](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/243))
- Clear Composer cache before running `build:project:create` in tests ([#242](https://github.com/pantheon-systems/terminus-build-tools-plugin/issues/242))
